pages.text: 16|15|geubun-eun sandeul-eul daeji wie gojeongsikisyeoss-euni ineun neohuileul anjeong ke hagoja ham-iyo tto geu wie gang gwa gil-eul dusyeoss-eumae ilo neohuiga seuseuloleul indohadolog ham-ila
16|16|ijeongpyowa byeoldeullosseo salamdeul i banghyang-eul al su issnola
16|17|icheoleom changjohasineun geubun-eul changjohal su eobsneun geosgwa biyuhaneunyo neohuiga kkaedadji mosham-ila
16|18|neohuiga hananim-ui eunhyeleul gyesanhanda haedo neohuineun geugeos-eul hea lil su eobs-euni sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
16|19|hananim-eun neohuiga gamchuneun geosgwa bakk-eulo natanaeneun modeun geosdo algo gyesinani
16|20|hananim oee geudeul-i sungbaeha neun geosdeul-eun amu geosdo changjohal su eobsneun pijomuldeullo
16|21|geudeul-eun saengmyeong-i eobsneun jug-eun geosdeullo geudeul-i eonje buhwaldoellyeonji mo leunila
16|22|neohuiui sin-eun hollo gyesin hananim-ila geuleona naeseleul midji ani han jadeul-eun geudeul-ui ma-eum-i saagha yeo omanham-eul peoudeola
16|23|hananim-eun geudeul-i sumgineun geos gwa bakk-eulo natanaeneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesimae omanhan jadeul-eul salangha ji ani hasinola
16|24|geudeul-ege neohui junim-i mueos eul gyesihaessneunyo lago mul-euni yesnal uhwadeul-ila malhayeossdeola
16|25|geudeullo hayeogeum simpan-ui nal geudeul-ui joeaggwa geudeul-i mujihayeo bang hwangke han joeag-eul jilm-eojidolog hali ni geudeul-i jilm-eojil geugeos-e jeojuga iss-eulila

16|26|geudeul ijeon-ui joeindeuldo eummo hayeoss-eumae hananimkkeseo geudeul jibdeul-uijijuleul muneotteulisa jibung-i geudeul wieseo muneojideola ileohge hayeo beol-eun geudeul-i insighaji moshaneun gos eseo dolaehanila
